id.description: Unique identifier for the location (Provided by application)

name.description: Name of the settlement (e.g., Havenwood, Port Azure)

description.description: Overall description of the settlement's character, atmosphere, and setting

parentLocationId.description: ID of the parent location (e.g., Region ID, provided by application)

typicalOccupants.description: Free-form description of the general populace.

purpose.description: The primary function or reason for the settlement's existence

size.description: Size category (e.g., Hamlet, Village, Town, City)

districts.description: List of districts within the settlement. LLM uses names, application generates IDs.

name.description: Name of the district (e.g., Market Square, Old Town)

description.description: Description of the district's character and appearance

hinting_at.description: What secret, plot hook, or information this POI might reveal

typicalOccupants.description: Optional specific occupants for this district if different from settlement.
